Tag Project

A different Tag Editor/Picker then usual

Under Development - V. 0.4.1

GitHub

Inizialization ( 1. Example )

TagProject can be initialized as the follow ( this can change in future release to integrate it with Jquery ):

The result will be:

You can Pass tags list on init:

The color of a tag can be one choosed by the default colors list or you can set a custom color with colorBackground property .

TagProject with lists tags loaded on init:

Colors CSS class

Bind one of the follow class with backgroundCSS property

  • label-red
  • label-pink
  • label-purple
  • label-deeppurple
  • label-indigo
  • label-blue
  • label-lightblue
  • label-cyan
  • label-teal
  • label-green
  • label-lightgreen
  • label-lime
  • label-yellow
  • label-amber
  • label-orange
  • label-deeporange
  • label-brown
  • label-grey
  • label-bluegrey

Events ( 2. Example )

You can subscribe to some events and take some action to save the changes on server side or other.
